columns.name: member_account_id
columns.description: The AWS Account ID in which the resource is located.

columns.name: delegated_admin_account_id
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the Amazon Inspector delegated administrator for this member account.

columns.name: only_associated
columns.description: Specifies whether to list only currently associated members if True or to list all members within the organization if False.

columns.name: relationship_status
columns.description: The status of the member account. Valid values are: CREATED | INVITED | DISABLED | ENABLED | REMOVED | RESIGNED | DELETED | EMAIL_VERIFICATION_IN_PROGRESS | EMAIL_VERIFICATION_FAILED | REGION_DISABLED | ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED | CANNOT_CREATE_DETECTOR_IN_ORG_MASTER.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: A timestamp showing when the status of this member was last updated.
